sentences.sContent: And ever since that day , I have considered becoming a bigamist .
sentences.sContent_eng: And ever since that day , I have considered becoming a bigamist .
sentences.sCn: 自从那一天，我曾考虑成为重婚行为。

sentences.sContent: The last thing they were going to look kindly on, if they chose to see it this way, was a bigamist with a mixed-race baby.
sentences.sContent_eng: The last thing they were going to look kindly on, if they chose to see it this way, was a bigamist with a mixed-race baby.
sentences.sCn: 如果像双方的家庭成员所说的那样，他们做的最后一件事将会是宽容的对待一个育有混种族婴儿的重婚者。

remMethod.val: bi (两) + gam (婚姻) + ist (人) → 重婚者

trans.tranOther: A bigamist is a person who commits the crime of marrying someone when they are already legally married to someone else
